title: A small Zed Montage! Please give some feedback! cheers :)

embed.description: not alot of clips, well not as many as i would of liked, was on a bit of a time rush so just edited this one! enjoy!

body: only a small montage, took a while to put it all together came out alright i guess, looking for some feedback on it! thanks guys :)

replies.body:
TBH i like it from 2:36 i like how it seems you went inside zed worm hole (dead zed) and then the clarity of video

In you don't use to much frames and modes and keep it simple and clean clip it would be amazing :) of course you can use those effects but not through out the video as  it hurts your eyes and so hard to watch and notice things :) hope you are getting it what i am trying to say ^^
ayee thankyou so much for the feedback, means alot and i do understand what you are saying XD!
Nice video! Editing is really, REALLY good, and the plays are good too. Congrats
cheers!!! thanks for the positive feedback, gonna be doing alot more montages soon. maybe of pro players who knows :)
